item.title: Apache Struts 2
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Struts Announcements https://struts.apache.org/announce-2021 Community Resources Resource Link Apache Struts Release Downloads https://struts.apache.org/download.cgi#struts-ga Community Notes Source Note CISAGov The Apache Struts group is pleased to announce that Struts 2.5.28.1 is available as a “General Availability” release. The GA designation is our highest quality grade.
